name: Save the frames
description:
As an arcade terminal, escape the hell of greasy fingers and runny noses that you have to endure every day of your life without attracting too much attention from customers and before the arcade closes.

Game design in 48h during a gamejam.
Main theme: it's not a bug, it's a feature.

Other themes: Arcade, survival, stealth.

Music: freesound.org
